KOTH_HELP_DESCRIPTION: A temporary leaderboard, which allows the top member to earn different rewards.
KOTH_HELP_USAGE: Set a reward for the top member of the koth leaderbaord.```/koth reward <role>```
Shows the koth leaderboard for the server.```/koth leaderboard```

KOTH_WINNERS_SENT: Koth winners announcement has been sent to %s.
